channel.title: Website problem
channel.description:
Okay so i have e107. and i installed e107bb (intergrates phpbb with my site)
I installed PHPbb in the same database as told and installed e107bb.
Now when i go on my forum i get:
[code]General Error SQL ERROR [ mysql4 ]
Unknown column 'loginname' in 'where clause' [1054]
An sql error occurred while fetching this page. Please contact an administrator if this problem persists.[/code]
Halp :S
www.penninepoker.com/forum
*Will delete URL once problem fixed.
MORE INFO:
Also, If i uninstall e107bb then the forum works again.

item.title: Website problem
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:2, topic:394456”]I’m guessing you uninstalled e107bb again? Because the forum is loading fine.

Looks like the plugin is messing the website up, I’ve worked with e107 in the past and have found that some plugins need to be edited manually before added to e107. Obviously when you installed e107bb it changes most of the table prefix set for the SQL database, making it share from the e107 portal thus causing you to have problems.

I’ll test it out for you and see what I can do, if I get any luck I will post the fix here.[/quote]

Yea i uninstalled it, Cheers for your time.

Read full topic

item.title: Website problem
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

I’m guessing you uninstalled e107bb again? Because the forum is loading fine.

Looks like the plugin is messing the website up, I’ve worked with e107 in the past and have found that some plugins need to be edited manually before added to e107. Obviously when you installed e107bb it changes most of the table prefix set for the SQL database, making it share from the e107 portal thus causing you to have problems.

I’ll test it out for you and see what I can do, if I get any luck I will post the fix here.

Read full topic
